text: Maramdi eikhoina nakhoida Aphaba Pao purakpa adu wahei khaktana natte, adubu madu panggalga loinana, Thawai Asengbaga loinana amasung masigi achumba asi sungsoi soidre haibaga loinana nakhoida purakkhibani. Nakhoiga leiminnaringei matamda eikhoina karamna hingkhibage haibadu nakhoina khang-i; madu nakhoigi phananabagidamaktani.
